item.description: only for self tracking and keep motivated to read more. reading thinking, fast and slow - daniel kahneman atomic habits - james clear blackout - marc elsberg the dragonbone chair - tad williams < pipe ego is the enemy - ryan holiday do the work - steven pressfield 365 days with self discipline - martin meadows ignore everybody - hugh macleod the war of art - steven pressfield moonwalking with einstein - joshua foer how to take smart notes - söhnke ahrens read in 2023 goal: 0/1ß
